ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (Sorry if you feel moded but animals, wolves included can tell when something doesn t belong. unless you mean the returning to the ark. the ark is maximal base

(Sorry if you feel moded but animals, wolves included can tell when 
something doesn't belong. unless you mean the returning to the ark. 
the ark is maximal base so first priority would be protect it, not 
carry a conversation.)
(This happens before he ran off then.)

"Ya I'm Lunarpine, and what's wrong is that you arrive at about the 
same time as an attack on my base. I don't believe in coincidenses."

Lunarpine stepped back to keep the strangers out of arms reach. "Your 
names are?" his eyes continuously moved back and fourth between the 
three strangers.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Cyberwolf, you just moded my characters! But I was going to step 
them closer
> anyway, so you get away this time, just don't let it happen again.
> 
> "What is wrong?" Inzola asked.
> 
> "You are the Lunarpine from the data tracks?" Deemos asked...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 6:33 PM
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> > Lunarpine glared at the new arrivals. He wasn't looking at them, 
he seemed
> > to be stareing through them. They had a scent he knew all to 
well, the
> scent
> > of trouble. like all curious wolves he watched them carefully, 
Every
> > movement they made was etched in his memory banks, he watched 
careully,
> > concernedly for the one move that would give away thier intent. 
Inzola and
> > Deemos stood close to Shadow Wing, to close for his taste.
> >
> > "Back away Wing, I don't like the smell of this." he moved closer 
to the
> > owlbot, looked toward her with the corner of his eyes and said in 
a
> muffled,
> > growling voice, "And when I give the word get your tailfeathers 
back to
> the
> > Ark for reinforcements." He knew they could call it in on thier 
comms but
> he
> > didn't want her around when the mech fluid began to run.
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: THECODE <thecode@p...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, July 25, 2000 4:28 PM
> > Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> >
> >
> > > Inzola suddenly came up near Shadow Wing and Lunarpine. Deemos 
landing
> by
> > > her side and looking at Lunarpine...
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 25, 2000 12:48 PM
> > > Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> > >
> > >
> > > > "Are you alright?"Lunarpine asked with more concern in his 
voice than
> > > > he'd origionally intended."Are you able to fly?"
> > > >
> > > > He helped Shadow Wing to her feet (Talons) and checked her 
wing.
> > > > Nothing appearedto be damaged beyond internal repair 
capabilities.
> > > >
> > > > He looked in her great owl eyes and saw the beast she 
could've been
> > > > if she wasn't a transformer. A spark which seemed to be 
wanting
> > > > completion. He kissed the top of her beak and brushed his hand
> > > > through her soft downy feathers.
> > > >
> > > > Unfortunately Lunarpine didn't know when to shut up."See I 
told you
> > > > not to worry about my eyes."
> > > >
> > > >  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > > >
> > > > > She slowly opened her eyes.  Lunarpine had her wing pinned 
to the
> > > > > ground.  She turned her head to see the tree had fallen 
next to
> > > > her.
> > > > > She turned back to look at Lunarpine. She was slightly 
dazed by the
> > > > > fall but assest the situation quickly.  With her wing 
pinned, he
> > > > won
> > > > > this round. She sighed, "You win this round beloved." She 
raised
> > > > her
> > > > > head and lightly touched her beak to his nose.
> > > > > "Now if you would please let me up."
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > > > seeing her down surprised Lunarpine, he thought for sure 
she'd be
> > > > > > able to dodge, and when she did he'd take his 
advantage.His
> > > > > emotional
> > > > > > outburst caught her by surprise and he wasn't about to 
let her
> > > > get
> > > > > > hurt, but he knew she'd win then, With the speed and 
grace of the
> > > > > > aminal he'd adapted he leapt to her side and reached for 
her wing
> > > > > so
> > > > > > she couldn't recover. (Is she pinned by the trees or off 
to the
> > > > > side?)
